meanings.sent1: The unamiable cat hissed at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent2: The unamiable weather made everyone stay indoors.
meanings.sent3: The unamiable teacher's frown scared the students into silence.
meanings.sent4: The unamiable storm clouds loomed ominously overhead.
meanings.sent5: The unamiable expression on his face made it clear he was in a bad mood.

meanings.sent1: The unamiable customer complained about everything in the store.
meanings.sent2: The unamiable child refused to share his toys with others.
meanings.sent3: The unamiable squirrel chattered angrily at anyone who approached its tree.
meanings.sent4: The unamiable traffic jam seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The unamiable tone of her voice made it hard to approach her with questions.
